triples.name: Markov decision process
triples.relevance: The paper studies constrained Markov decision processes, building on this foundational framework for sequential decision-making under uncertainty.

triples.name: Linear programming
triples.relevance: The paper reduces the control dynamic problem into an infinite linear programming problem as a key technique in their approach.

triples.name: Lagrange multiplier
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a Lagrangian approach for sensitivity analysis in the constrained control problem.

triples.name: Constrained optimization
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the core task of constrained optimization by minimizing one cost objective subject to inequality constraints on other objectives.
